feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [GRA][BHS] [Data logs] Index backend migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 15, 12:00 - 15:00 UTC

Apr 15, 00:08 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/06/2022 12:00 UTC
End time : 15/06/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : No downtime expected in term of log ingestion, but ES API will not be available for a maximum time of two hours.
Service improvement: The indexation backend of Logs Data Platform will be replaced from Elasticsearch to OpenSearch.
Kibana instances will be replaced by OpenSearch Dashboards ones.

APIv6 calls related to ElasticSearch backend will be automatically redirected to new OpenSearch backend and will remain available until September 2022.

The following documentation : https://docs.ovh.com/fr/logs-data-platform/ will be updated few days before the migration.

entry.title: [RBX2][BareMetal] - Electrical incident rows from 21B to 21D
entry.content:
May 3, 17:39 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 03/05/2022 09:15 UTC
End Time : 03/05/2022 17:08 UTC
All servers are restarted. The incident has been resolved.

The power supplies in rows 21B to 21D had to be shut down in order to should work safely on the faulty electrical component.

We apologies for any inconvenience caused.

May 3, 16:22 UTC
Update - There are very few servers not turning on yet.
Our technical teams are working on bringing them back on.

We will post updates when necessary.

May 3, 15:28 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

May 3, 15:28 UTC
Update - We are focusing on the servers that are not up yet.

Next update in 60 minutes.

May 3, 14:22 UTC
Update - We are checking the remaining servers that need more work.

Next update in 60 minutes.

May 3, 13:22 UTC
Update - We are working on the remaining servers.

Next update in 60 minutes.

May 3, 12:35 UTC
Update - We are still focusing on the remaining servers.

Next update in 30 minutes.

May 3, 12:02 UTC
Update - We are still focusing on the remaining servers.

Next update in 30 minutes.

May 3, 11:33 UTC
Update - The servers have restarted.

We are focusing on the remaining servers that need checking.

May 3, 11:14 UTC
Monitoring - We have replaced the faulty electrical component.

We will start turning on the servers in the rows that have been impacted (21B to 21D).

We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

May 3, 10:40 UTC
Update - The electrical intervention is still in progress. We estimate it at 15 minutes.

May 3, 10:07 UTC
Identified - The electrical intervention is in progress. It should be completed within next 30 minutes.

May 3, 09:52 UTC
Update - All servers in rows 21B to 21D are now offline.

We are working on the failed electrical components.

May 3, 09:25 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/05/2022 09:15UTC
Service impact : Servers in rows 21B to 21D will be shut down due to an electrical incident.
Ongoing actions : We detected an electrical incident. This will cause several servers to be down for more than two hours.
This incident impacts the servers on the rows 21B to 21D

Next update in 60 minutes. (10H30 UTC)

We apologise in advance for any inconvenience caused.

entry.title: [RBX4][Network] - Rack 50D29-30-31
entry.content:
May 3, 15:35 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 03/05/2022 13:33 UTC
End Time : 03/05/2022 17:33 UTC
Service impact : Public network was unreachable
Servers in rack 50D29-30-31 were not reachable through a public network.
Our technical teams the network equipment. Servers are now reachable.

May 3, 13:46 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/05/2022 13:33 UTC
Service impact : Public network unreachable
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Servers in rack 50D29-30-31 are not reachable through a public network.
Our technical teams are currently investigating the issue and working on bringing the public network back.
